creator: basel.zhang@gmail.com
text:
Attribute "includes" of FileSet cannot recognise the files starts with
dot-hash(".#").

CVS plug-in for Eclipse sometime create files starts with dot-hash and I want to
remove them by delete task. The script likes below:

<delete verbose="true" deleteonexit="true" failonerror="false"
includeemptydirs="true">
	<fileset dir="D:/B2G/B2GApplication/" includes="**/.#*" />
</delete>

But the task cannot function properly.
